title: E-Commerce Website
description: A fully functional E-Commerce web application built using MERN Stack. It includes product listing, user authentication, cart management, and payment integration.

title: Hand Cricket Game
description: A fun JavaScript based Hand Cricket game where you can play against the computer. It helps in learning basic JS concepts like loops, conditionals, and random number generation.

title: Traveling-website
description: A simple and responsive traveling website built using HTML and CSS at the beginning of my full-stack development journey
